column4: ok im about to have a fresh install of ubuntu 5.1 on my desktop.... now will someone explain why nvidia drivers are such a bitch
sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx && sudo nvidia-glx-config enable
what does it say?
near the end it will tell you the error
yes?
look for lines that have either "EE" or "!!" in them
then look in /var/log/Xorg.0.log
very well lol. I personally find it a challenge (one of the GOOD ones) to rescue my system without reinstalling
Wait "other monitor"?
Try disconnecting the second monitor...
Multiple monitors is something I know nothing about lol. Lets see if the primary one works
sure if you want
okay
then at least it isn't the monitor
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
it doesn't matter
X is up?
I don't know if Voodoo is supported...
yes, until you get the NVidia GLX
Are you trying to run multiple monitors
I can get your Hardware Accel working, but I know nothing about multiple monitors
so is X working now?
What is connected now?
I mean what card is it runnnig off of
